trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class represents a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> representa um elemento de configuração para um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> podem ser configuradas para aplicativos de servidor usando arquivos de configuração padrão.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> está definida como `null`.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> instância da classe deve ser definida para os valores apropriados para o aplicativo antes de chamar o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> method builds a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance based on the properties set on the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O método <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> compila uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> com base nas propriedades definidas na classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que representa a política de proteção estendida criada.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> instância da classe deve ser definida antes de chamar o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista SPN (Nome do Provedor de Serviços) personalizado usada para correspondência com o SPN de um cliente para este elemento da política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> que inclui a lista SPN personalizada usada para correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de imposição de política para este elemento de política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> valor que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de proteção imposta pela política de proteção estendida para este elemento de política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.
